original_text: And he hath brought thee near to him, and all thy brethren the sons of Levi with thee: and seek ye the priesthood also?
korean_text: 하나님이 너와 네 모든 형제 레위 자손으로 너와 함께 가까이 오게 하셨거늘 너희가 오히려 제사장의 직분을 구하느냐

sentences.original_text: And he hath brought thee near to him
and all thy brethren the sons of Levi with thee
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 함께 네 모든 형제 레위 자손도

sentences.original_text: and seek ye the priesthood also?
